body:
Features and Enhancements

Components
  • Enhancements

    • Multi-Network Select:
      • It's now easier to see and select your Network criteria from within the updated dropdown lists.
      • In the table below, for each report, the listed search field(s) now use the Multi-Network Select update.
        • Report Updated Search Field Name(s)
        Competitive Dashboard  - Networks
        Compare Networks  - to
        Create a List  - Networks
        Recruitment  - View providers NOT in
         - but in

      • In this table, for this report, the listed field now displays categorized Networks.
        • Report Network Categorized Only Field
        Compare Networks  - Compare

    • Shortcuts: - Includes all the previously available shortcuts
      • All project networks
      • All my networks
        • Includes two categories: My Networks and Published Networks (only if NBO is enabled for the project and the user has access to NBO)
      • All competitor networks

    • New buttons include the following and display in the updated dropdowns listing networks:
      • Select All
      • Select All My Networks
        • Only selects My Networks
      • Select All Competitor Networks
      • Select All Published Networks (only if NBO is enabled for the project and the user has access to NBO)

    • For each Network field within the criteria section, a button was added to either "Select All" or, "Deselect All" Networks for that category
      • Click "Select All" and Network360 will automatically ADD all the networks within that category.
      • Click "Deselect All" and Network360 will automatically REMOVE all of the networks within that category.
        • You can use the Deselect All button for a Category
        • You can also use the Deselect All button once all the Networks for that category are selected.

    • Users can still opt to click individual filter criteria separately if they so choose.
